name: wp-datepicker-styling
description: jQuery UI Datepicker CSS for WordPress.

scripts.dev: postcss src/datepicker.scss --output datepicker.css --env dev --config src/postcss-configs/main; prettier datepicker.css --write;
scripts.remap: postcss src/general.scss --replace --config src/postcss-configs/remap; postcss src/schemes/default.scss --replace --config src/postcss-configs/remap; postcss src/schemes/fresh.scss --replace --config src/postcss-configs/remap;
